title: ByteDance says it will add safeguards to Seedance 2.0 following Hollywood backlash
summary_full: ByteDance has said it will work to strengthen safeguards on a new AI video-making tool, following copyright concerns and legal threats from Hollywood.
summary_public: ByteDance has said it will work to strengthen safeguards on a new AI video-making tool, following copyright concerns and legal threats from Hollywood.
